ideas.title: pet_fact_generator
ideas.description: This tool provides an engaging experience for animal lovers by offering a mix of random cat and dog facts, creating a dynamic and varied informational feed. Users can get different facts about cats or dogs, providing a quick way to learn interesting insights about these popular animals.
apis_used: cat facts (Retrieve a random cat fact)
dog facts (Retrieve a random dog image) - The application alternates between showing a random cat fact or a random dog image
presenting a variety of pet-related content to the user.
